Subject: The Proposel Of Peace
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He hoped there would be peace. He was sick of war. All he really want
was to settle down, with KitKat.

::Demolition::

"one cycle, aye!"
He opened fire on Blender.

::Hot Rod::

He stagered back to hid room, drunk. He made it to the bed, and passed
out. He had a dream.
He was on a junk planet. He had just walked out of a Quintison ship. The
Dinobots were behind him, and Kup was next to him. He was looking at an
odd group of Transformers. He turned to Kup.
"What was that universal greeting, again? Nevermind I remember." He
turned back to the odd TFs, and pulled out a Energon stick.
"Bah weep grana weep nini bong." The leader excepted the Energon. they
repeated the greeting a few time. The Junkions and Autobots danced.
He continued to remember the past. His grief over Feline was combating
the chip.

OOC: Dont worry he is not turning good anythime soon. He will have a
battle of good and evil in his head for a wile though.
